desc: RevTgt: reverse the sentiment of the target aspect.

examples.ori: BEST spicy tuna roll, great asian salad. (Target: spicy tuna roll)
examples.trans: BAD spicy tuna roll, great asian salad.

examples.ori: The food was extremely tasty, creatively presented and the wine excellent. (Target: food)
examples.trans: The food was extremely tasteless, not creatively presented and the wine excellent.
